meanings.definition: A piece of art, such as a painting or sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The artwork on display at the museum was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She purchased a beautiful artwork for her living room.
meanings.sent3: The artwork in the gallery made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was a window into his soul.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the artwork popped off the canvas.

meanings.definition: The creation of visual works of art.
meanings.sent1: Her artwork was displayed in the local art show.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unique style was evident in her artwork.
meanings.sent3: Creating artwork brought her so much joy.
meanings.sent4: The artwork of nature is the most beautiful of all.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details in the artwork were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The act of producing artistic pieces.
meanings.sent1: His artwork was admired by all who saw it.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours perfecting her artwork.
meanings.sent3: The artwork of baking a cake is both science and art.
meanings.sent4: The artwork of storytelling captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The delicate artwork of embroidery requires patience and skill.
